titles: A sermo[n]d [sic] spoken before the kynge his maiestie at Grenwiche, vppon good fryday: the yere of our Lord. M.CCCCCxxxvi. By Iohan Longlo[n]d byshope of Linclone. Ad laudem & gloriam Christi, & ad memoriam gloriosæ passionis eius
author: Longland, John, 1473-1547.
notes: "In types used by J. Mayler beginning in 1539".--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
